bioAsHtml: I currently work for Microsoft on the famous productivity app Wunderlist. I started my development career as a Java developer, but became unhappy with it soon . Once i opened up my mind for other languages, i fell in love with Scala pretty quickly. I'm still fascinated by the possibilities of the language, as i'm not constrained to work within a single paradigm. Instead i get to choose between OO, FP and lately also Type Level Programming. I enjoy sharing my learnings with others and would like to do this at the next ScalaIO! :)
